summary: Comprehensive testing of Sentinel Federated Learning system completed. Backend APIs 91% functional, frontend 100% functional, but critical aggregation bug blocks core federated learning workflow.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 500 Internal Server Error due to numpy deserialization failure in deserialize_model_weights function
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks core federated learning functionality and scheduler auto-aggregation
critical_bugs.error_details: _pickle.UnpicklingError: Failed to interpret file as a pickle - numpy.load() fails even with allow_pickle=True

working_endpoints: /api/auth/register - Company registration and API key generation

passed_tests: Dashboard login with API key authentication
Dashboard stats display (10 companies, 2 rounds, 87% accuracy)
Notification bell icon and dropdown functionality
All backend API endpoints except aggregation
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix gradient aggregation endpoint - the numpy deserialization in deserialize_model_weights function is failing. This blocks the core federated learning workflow, scheduler auto-aggregation, and notification creation. The issue persists even after adding allow_pickle=True parameter.
